responsible.title: Responsible Party (Controller)
responsible.body: Contact the controller for any privacy questions or requests.

items.account: Account Data: Username, email address, and password (stored as a secure hash).
items.event: Event Data: Event names, dates, timezones, and availability times you enter.
items.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and timestamps.

items.service: To provide the scheduling service (creating events, saving availability).
items.emails: To send system emails (email verification, password resets).
items.fraud: To protect the site from spam and abuse.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.brevo: Brevo (Sendinblue) for transactional emails; your email address is processed to send codes and notifications.
thirdParties.recaptcha: Google reCAPTCHA (v2/Enterprise) analyzes traffic (e.g., IP, mouse movements) to block bots; legal basis: legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

items.essential: Essential Cookies: a secure session cookie (rt) keeps you logged in.
items.localStorage: Local Storage: we store your preferredTimezone to show times correctly.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: Under the GDPR, you can access, correct, or delete your data. You can delete your account anytime in settings to remove your personal data from our active database.
